dir.description: The global reading direction of your application. This will be inherited by all primitives.
dir.description_zh: 应用程序的全局读取方向。这将被所有原语继承。

:scrollBody.description: The global scroll body behavior of your application. This will be inherited by the related primitives.
:scrollBody.description_zh: 应用程序的全局滚动体行为。这将由相关的原语继承。
